```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import it2struve0
>>> it2struve0(1.)
0.9571973506383524 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x = np.linspace(-10., 10., 1000)
>>> it2struve0_values = it2struve0(x)
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, it2struve0_values)
>>> ax.set_xlabel(r'$x$')
>>> ax.set_ylabel(r'$\int_x^{\infty}\frac{H_0(t)}{t}\,dt$')
>>> plt.show() 
```
